languages.text: {n}На ваших глазах плоть существа начинает стремительно регенерировать. За считанные секунды кости срастаются по осколкам, отрастают сосуды, внутренние органы и нервная система, кровь притягивается обратно к туше и всасывается сквозь обнаженные ткани и наросшую кожу с мелкими чешуйками. Через минуту перед вами вновь предстает то же существо, на сей раз — с гневно светящимися желто-огненными глазами.{/n} "Тхма о'дрфт па'ктч внглд мех'к!"

traits.locale_text: {n}На ваших глазах плоть существа начинает стремительно регенерировать. За считанные секунды кости стростаются по ослолкам, отрастают сосуды, внутренние органы и нервная система, кровь притягивается обратно к туше и всасывается сквозь обнаженные ткани и внонь наросшую кожу с мелкими чешуйками. Через минуту перед вами вновь предстает то же существо, на сей раз — с гневно светящимися желто-огненными глазами.{/n} "Тхма о'дрфт па'ктч внглд мех'к!"
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"
languages.original_text: {n}На ваших глазах плоть существа начинает стремительно регенерировать. За считанные секунды кости срастаются по осколкам, отрастают сосуды, внутренние органы и нервная система, кровь притягивается обратно к туше и всасывается сквозь обнаженные ткани и наросшую кожу с мелкими чешуйками. Через минуту перед вами вновь предстает то же существо, на сей раз — с гневно светящимися желто-огненными глазами.{/n} "Тхма о'дрфт па'ктч внглд мех'к!"

The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your eyes. Within seconds, the bones are fused together again, the vessels, internal organs and nervous system grow back, the blood flows back toward the carcass and is absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly growing skin with tiny scales. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

languages.text: {n}生き物の肉体が眼前で素早く再生し始める。わずか数秒で骨が繋がった。血管、内臓、神経系が元に戻る。飛び散ってしまった血は死体へと戻り、露出した組織を通じて吸収され、鱗に覆われた皮膚を素早く再生した。次の瞬間には先ほどいたものと同じ生き物が目の前に立っていたが、今度は怒りに満ちた燃えるような黄色い目でこちらを見ている。{/n}「トマ・オドルフト・パクチ・ウングルド・メケ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

traits.locale_text: {n}生き物の肉体が眼前で素早く再生し始める。わずか数秒で骨が繋がった。血管、内臓、神経系が元に戻る。飛び散ってしまった血は死体へと戻り、露出した組織を通じて吸収され、鱗に覆われた皮膚を素早く再生した。次の瞬間には先ほどいたものと同じ生き物が目の前に立っていたが、今度は怒りに満ちた燃えるような黄色い目でこちらを見ている。{/n}「トマ・オドルフト・パクチ・ウングルド・メケ！」
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}La carne de la criatura se regenera rápidamente ante tu mirada. En cuestión de segundos, los huesos vuelven a estar unidos. Los vasos sanguíneos, los órganos internos y el sistema nervioso vuelven a crecer. La sangre esparcida fluye hacia el cadáver y queda absorbida por el tejido expuesto y la piel escamosa, que se reforma visiblemente. Al cabo de un momento, tienes delante a la misma criatura, pero esta vez sus ojos amarillentos arden con furia.{/n} «Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!».
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La carne de la criatura se regenera rápidamente ante tu mirada. En cuestión de segundos, los huesos vuelven a estar unidos. Los vasos sanguíneos, los órganos internos y el sistema nervioso vuelven a crecer. La sangre esparcida fluye hacia el cadáver y queda absorbida por el tejido expuesto y la piel escamosa, que se reforma visiblemente. Al cabo de un momento, tienes delante a la misma criatura, pero esta vez sus ojos amarillentos arden con furia.{/n} «Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!».
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}在你面前，这只怪物的肉体迅速再生。转瞬之间，它的骨架再次拼合，血管、内脏和神经系统也纷纷复位，飞溅的鲜血原路返回，通过开放的伤口被组织重新吸收，身体上再次长出了一层坚硬的鳞片。短短几秒种后，那只怪物就原封不动地再次出现在你眼前。只不过这一回，它那双黄色的眼睛怒火中烧。{/n}“Thmao'drftpa'ktchvngldmeh'k!”
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

traits.locale_text: {n}在你面前，这只怪物的肉体迅速再生。转瞬之间，它的骨架再次拼合，血管、内脏和神经系统也纷纷复位，飞溅的鲜血原路返回，通过开放的伤口被组织重新吸收，身体上再次长出了一层坚硬的鳞片。短短几秒种后，那只怪物就原封不动地再次出现在你眼前。只不过这一回，它那双黄色的眼睛怒火中烧。{/n}“Thmao'drftpa'ktchvngldmeh'k!”
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}La chair blessée de la créature commence à se régénérer sous vos yeux. En l'espace de quelques secondes, tous les os se sont ressoudés. Les veines, les organes internes et le système nerveux se reforment. Le sang qui a éclaboussé la pièce retourne à la carcasse et est absorbé par les tissus à vif qui sont bien vite recouverts de peau écailleuse. En quelques instants, c'est une créature au corps intact qui se tient devant vous. La seule différence réside dans les yeux jaunes qui étincellent de fureur.{/n} « Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

Les veines, les organes internes et le système nerveux se reforment. En quelques instants, c'est une créature au corps intact qui se tient devant vous. La seule différence réside dans les yeux jaunes qui étincellent de fureur.{/n} « Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k ! »
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Das Fleisch der Kreatur beginnt, sich vor deinen Augen extrem schnell zu regenerieren. Innerhalb von Sekunden sind die Knochen wieder verschmolzen. Die Blutgefäße, die inneren Organe und das Nervensystem wachsen neu. Das vergossene Blut fließt zurück in Richtung des Kadavers und wird von dem freiliegenden Gewebe und der sich rasant erneuernden Schuppen haut absorbiert. Dieselbe Kreatur steht nur einen Augenblick später vor dir, doch diesmal brennt in ihren feurigen gelben Augen der Zorn.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"

languages.text: {n}Gözlerinin önünde yaratığın bedeni hızla yenilenmeye başlıyor. Birkaç saniye içinde kemikleri yeniden kaynaşıyor. Damarları, iç organları ve sinir sistemi eski hâline dönüyor. Dökülen kanlar, cesede doğru geri akıp açıkta kalan dokular ve hızla iyileşen pullu deriyle emilmeye başlıyor. Ardından aynı yaratık yeniden karşında dursa da bu kez hararetli sarı gözlerinden öfke okunuyor.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's flesh starts swiftly regenerating before your very eyes. Within seconds the bones are once again fused together. The vessels, internal organs, and nervous system grow back. The spatter of blood flows back toward the carcass, being absorbed through the exposed tissue and rapidly recovering scale-marked skin. The same creature is standing before you a moment later, but this time its fiery yellow eyes are burning with anger.{/n} "Thma o'drft pa'ktch vngld meh'k!"
